  • Generating Text with Markoff Chains

    28 Jan 2017

    In this post, I’m going to create superficially real-looking text using a Markoff chain. Markoff chains are really interesting and can be used in many different ways. I’m going to use them to transform normal, human-written text into computer-generated text that is different from the original, but sometimes indistinguishable from text produced by humans. Often, it’s completely silly.
    read more…
